original: saṃkrāmo 'tra na bhāvanā na ca kathāyuktir na carcā na ca
analyzed: saṃkrāmaḥ u tra na bhāvanā na ca kathā yuktiḥ na carcā na ca

original: dhyānaṃ vā na ca dhāraṇā na ca japābhyāsaprayāso na ca /
analyzed: dhyānam vā na ca dhāraṇā na ca japa abhyāsa prayāsaḥ na ca

original: tat kiṃ nāma suniścitaṃ vada paraṃ satyaṃ ca tacchrūyatāṃ
analyzed: tat kim nāma su niścitam vada param satyam ca tat śrūyatām

original: na tyāgī na parigrahī bhaja sukhaṃ sarvaṃ yathāvasthitaḥ // 1 //
analyzed: na tyāgī na parigrahī bhaja sukham sarvam yathā avasthitaḥ

original: saṃsāro 'sti na tattvatas tanubhṛtāṃ bandhasya vārtaiva kā
analyzed: saṃsāraḥ asti na tattvataḥ tanubhṛtām bandhasya vārtā eva kā

original: bandho yasya na jātu tasya vitathā muktasya muktikriyā /
analyzed: bandhaḥ yasya na jātu tasya vitathā muktasya mukti kriyā

original: mithyāmohakṛd eṣa rajjubhujagacchāyāpiśācabhramo mā kiṃcit tyaja
analyzed: mithyā moha kṛt eṣa rajju bhujaga chāyā piśāca bhramaḥ mā kiṃcid tyaja
mā gṛhāṇa vihara svasthaḥ yathā avasthitaḥ
pūja pūjaka pūjya bheda saraṇiḥ kā iyam kathā anuttare saṃkrāmaḥ

original: kila kasya kena vidadhe ko vā praveśakramaḥ /
analyzed: kila kasya kena vidadhe kaḥ vā praveśa kramaḥ

original: māyeyam na cidadvayāt paratayā bhinnāpy aho vartate sarvaṃ
analyzed: māyā iyam na cit advayāt para tayā bhinnā api aho vartate sarvam
sva anubhava svabhāva vimalam cintām vṛthā mā kṛthāḥ
ānandaḥ tra na na eva aṅganā saṅgavat
dīpa arka indu kṛta prabhā prakara vat nā eva prakāśa udayaḥ
harṣaḥ saṃbhṛta bheda mukti sukha bhūḥ bhāra avatāra upamaḥ
rāga dveṣa sukha asukha udaya laya ahaṅkāra dainya ādayaḥ ye bhāvāḥ
pravibhānti viśva vapuṣaḥ bhinna svabhāvāḥ na te

original: vyaktiṃ paśyasi yasya yasya sahasā tattattadekātmatāsaṃvidrūpam
analyzed: vyaktim paśyasi yasya yasya sahasā tat tat tad eka ātma tā saṃvid rūpam
avekṣya kim na ramase tad bhāvanā nirbharaḥ

original: pūrvābhāvabhavakriyā hi sahasā bhāvāḥ sadā 'smin bhave
analyzed: pūrva abhāva bhava kriyāḥ hi sahasā bhāvāḥ sadā smin bhave
madhya ākāra vikāra saṃkaravatām teṣām kutas satyatā
niḥsatye capale prapañca nicaye svapna bhrame peśale
śaṅkā ātaṅka kalaṅka yukti kalanā atītaḥ prabuddhaḥ bhava

original: bhāvānāṃ na samudbhavo 'sti sahajas tvadbhāvitā bhānty amī
analyzed: bhāvānām na samudbhavaḥ sti sahajaḥ tvad bhāvitāḥ bhānti amī

original: niḥsatyā api satyatām anubhavabhrāntyā bhajanti kṣaṇam /
analyzed: niḥsatyāḥ api satya tām anubhava bhrāntyā bhajanti kṣaṇam

original: tvatsaṅkalpaja eṣa viśvamahimā nāsty asya janmānyataḥ
analyzed: tvad saṅkalpa jaḥ eṣa viśva mahimā na asti asya janma anyatas

original: tasmāt tvaṃ vibhavena bhāsi bhuvaneṣv ekopy anekātmakaḥ // 7 //
analyzed: tasmāt tvam vibhavena bhāsi bhuvaneṣu ekaḥ upi aneka ātmakaḥ

original: yat satyaṃ yad asatyam alpabahulaṃ nityaṃ na nityaṃ ca yat
analyzed: yat satyam yat asatyam alpa bahulam nityam na nityam ca yat

original: yan māyāmalinaṃ yad ātmavimalaṃ ciddarpaṇe rājate /
analyzed: yat māyā malinam yat ātma vimalam cit darpaṇe rājate
tat sarvam sva vimarśa saṃvid udayāt rūpa prakāśa ātmakam jñātvā
sva anubhava adhirūḍha mahimā viśveśvara tvam bhaja
iti śrīmat ācārya abhinavagupta pādaiḥ viracitā anuttarā aṣṭikā samāptā
var vilasa
gandharvanagaram
dso sanskrit archive
